snippet: The two companies will combine to try to give customers more access to video on the Web, and possibly position the new venture as an alternative to Netflix.
abstract: The two companies will combine to try to give customers more access to video on the Web, and possibly position the new venture as an alternative to Netflix.

headline.main: Verizon Teaming With Redbox for DVD and Streaming Service
headline.print_headline: Verizon and Redbox Join On DVDs and Streaming
